titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the George H. Viner Collection of Bookplate Catalogues compiled by Herbert M. Vaughan
Viner (George H.) Collection of Bookplate Catalogues compiled by Herbert M. Vaughan
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Molly E. Dotson

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:03

did.unittitle: George H. Viner Collection of Bookplate Catalogues compiled by Herbert M. Vaughan
did.abstract: This collection comprises seven half-bound, typescript volumes. Six are catalogues, compiled by Herbert M. Vaughan, of various bookplate collections held by the National Library of Wales; one is an index of artists and engravers of bookplates compiled by George H. Viner and based on catalogues produced by Vaughan.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Yale Bookplate Collection was formerly housed in Sterling Memorial Library. The collection was incorporated into the Arts of the Book Collection in 1984 and then moved to the Seeley G. Mudd Library in 1990. In 2011 it was transferred to the Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George H. Viner Collection of Bookplate Catalogues Compiled by Herbert M. Vaughan, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: George Heath Viner, Esq., F.S.A., was a bookplate enthusiast and member of the Ex Libris Society (London, England). Herbert Millingchamp Vaughan, M.A., F.S.A., was a noted expert on Welsh bookplates.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection comprises seven half-bound, typescript volumes. Six are catalogues, compiled by Herbert M. Vaughan, of various bookplate collections held by the National Library of Wales; one is an index of artists and engravers of bookplates, compiled by George H. Viner and based on catalogues produced by Vaughan. These limited edition works were commissioned by the National Library of Wales (Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru). The volumes are often inscribed or annotated with correspondence or other notes laid in. Six of the seven volumes bear Viner's armorial bookplate, which was designed by George W. Eve in 1905.

unittitle.title: The Elenor Collection of Book Plates: A Catalogue by Herbert Millingchamp Vaughan, M.A., F.S.A.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This volume contains one folded sheet of handwritten notes and one letter addressed to Viner, from W. Ll. Davies, M.A., Librarian of the National Library of Wales.

unittitle.title: A Catalogue of Book Plates from Various Sources compiled by Herbert Millingchamp Vaughan, M.A., F.S.A.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This volume contains four sheets of handwritten notes and one letter addressed to Viner, from W. Ll. Davies, M.A., Librarian of the National Library of Wales.

unittitle.title: The Llangibby Castle Collection of Book Plates: A Catalogue by Herbert Millingchamp Vaughan, M.A., F.S.A.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This volume contains one letter addressed to Viner, from W. Ll. Davies, M.A., Librarian of the National Library of Wales.

did.unittitle: A list of the Artists & Engravers of Book Plates culled from the Catalogues compiled by Herbert M. Vaughan, M.A., F.S.A., of various Collections in the National Library of Wales & in the Collection of Welsh Book Plates made by Sir Evan Jones, Baronet, of Pentower .

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This volume contains two letters addressed to Viner, from Vaughan, and two letters addressed to Viner, from W. Ll. Davies, M.A., Librarian of the National Library of Wales.

unittitle.title: Catalogue of the Collection of Book Plates formed by Arthur Schomberg and Herbert M. Vaughan, M.A., F.S.A., arranged and annotated by the Donor, Herbert M. Vaughan.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This volume contains one letter addressed to Viner, from Vaughan.

unittitle.title: The R. H. Gough Smallwood Collection of Book Plates in the National Library of Wales: Catalogue with Notes by Herbert M. Vaughan, F.S.A.
Catalogue with Notes of the R. D. Roberts Collection of Book Plates compiled by Herbert M. Vaughan, M.A., F.S.A.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This volume contains one letter addressed to Viner, from W. Ll. Davies, M.A., Librarian of the National Library of Wales.
